title: jaya jaya jagadIsha
sahitya:
jaya jaya jagadIsha nanda kishOra


anupallavi

  nayana vinindita naLina jagatraya bhaya vinivAraNa shubha carita


caraNam 1    ahivara kALiya phaNa krta narttana hata shakaTAsura vidhuvadana
    caraNam 2    vraja vanitAjana hrdayahara madhura vacana racana munijana sEvya
    caraNam 3    maNimaya bhUSaNa maNDita suranara mAnya carita sArasanAbha
